content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "bookshelf", "quantity": 64, "index": 21}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 4, "index": 22}, {"type": "stone_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "hopper_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 13, "index": 35}]

thought: To craft smooth_red_sandstone, I need to first craft red_sandstone. The recipe for red_sandstone requires 4 red_sand, which I have at slot 22. Therefore, I will move 1 red_sand from slot 22 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bookshelf", "quantity": 64, "index": 21}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 3, "index": 22}, {"type": "stone_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "hopper_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 13, "index": 35}]
thought: Now I have 1 red_sand in slot 1, I need to move another red_sand from slot 22 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "bookshelf", "quantity": 64, "index": 21}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 2, "index": 22}, {"type": "stone_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "hopper_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 13, "index": 35}]
thought: Now I have 2 red_sand in slots 1 and 2, I need to move another red_sand from slot 22 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "bookshelf", "quantity": 64, "index": 21}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "stone_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "hopper_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 13, "index": 35}]
thought: Now I have 3 red_sand in slots 1, 2 and 4, I need to move another red_sand from slot 22 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "red_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "bookshelf", "quantity": 64, "index": 21}, {"type": "stone_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "hopper_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 13, "index": 35}]
thought: Now I have the required red_sand in slots 1, 2, 4 and 5, I can craft red_sandstone. The red_sandstone will be moved to slot 0, which I will then move to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "red_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "bookshelf", "quantity": 64, "index": 21}, {"type": "stone_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "hopper_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 13, "index": 35}]
thought: Now I have the required red_sandstone at slot 11, I can craft smooth_red_sandstone. The red_sandstone will be moved to slot 12, which I will then move to a free inventory slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 11 to slot 12 with quantity 1
